event.description: Brett Gardner grounds out, second baseman Michael Martinez to first baseman John Mayberry.
Curtis Granderson doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Shane Victorino.
Nick Swisher flies out to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Raul Ibanez doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder Domonic Brown. Curtis Granderson scores.
Eric Chavez pops out to shortstop Jimmy Rollins.
Russell Martin strikes out swinging.
Eduardo Nunez flies out to center fielder Shane Victorino.
Bill Hall singles on a fly ball to right fielder Hunter Pence.
Jayson Nix grounds into a force out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to second baseman Michael Martinez. Bill Hall out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Dave Bush replaces Cole Hamels.
Brett Gardner called out on strikes.
Curtis Granderson homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Nick Swisher grounds out to first baseman John Mayberry.
Raul Ibanez grounds out, pitcher Dave Bush to first baseman John Mayberry.
Eric Chavez called out on strikes.
Russell Martin grounds out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to first baseman John Mayberry.
Eduardo Nunez grounds out, shortstop Jimmy Rollins to first baseman John Mayberry.
Defensive Substitution: Freddy Galvis replaces shortstop Jimmy Rollins, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Scott Podsednik replaces center fielder Shane Victorino, batting 2nd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Tyson Gillies replaces right fielder Hunter Pence, batting 3rd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Hector Luna replaces third baseman Ty Wigginton, batting 5th, playing third base.
Pitcher Change: Jonathan Papelbon replaces Dave Bush.
Bill Hall pops out to first baseman John Mayberry in foul territory.
Jayson Nix flies out to center fielder Tyson Gillies.
Brett Gardner pops out to third baseman Hector Luna.
Defensive Substitution: Juan Pierre replaces left fielder Domonic Brown, batting 7th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Kevin Frandsen replaces second baseman Michael Martinez, batting 9th, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Dontrelle Willis replaces Jonathan Papelbon.
Dewayne Wise grounds out, second baseman Kevin Frandsen to first baseman John Mayberry.
Cole Garner doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Juan Pierre.
Raul Ibanez pops out to pitcher Dontrelle Willis.
Jorge Vazquez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Scott Podsednik. Cole Garner scores. Jorge Vazquez to 2nd on the throw.
Russell Martin walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Ramiro Pena replaces Eduardo Nunez.
Ramiro Pena grounds into a force out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to second baseman Kevin Frandsen. Russell Martin out at 2nd.
Cesar Hernandez remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Defensive Substitution: Pete Orr replaces first baseman John Mayberry, batting 6th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Sebastian Valle replaces catcher Erik Kratz, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Defensive switch from second base to first base for Kevin Frandsen.
Pitcher Change: Chad Qualls replaces Dontrelle Willis.
Corban Joseph called out on strikes.
Brandon Laird flies out to right fielder Scott Podsednik.
Chris Dickerson doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Tyson Gillies.
Dewayne Wise triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Tyson Gillies. Chris Dickerson scores.
Cole Garner homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Dewayne Wise scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Justin Maxwell replaces Raul Ibanez.
Justin Maxwell flies out to right fielder Scott Podsednik.
Pitcher Change: Raul Valdes replaces Chad Qualls.
Jorge Vazquez strikes out swinging.
Gary Sanchez grounds out, third baseman Hector Luna to first baseman Kevin Frandsen.
Ramiro Pena strikes out swinging, catcher Sebastian Valle to first baseman Kevin Frandsen.
Pitcher Change: Michael Stutes replaces Raul Valdes.
Corban Joseph pops out to third baseman Hector Luna in foul territory.
Brandon Laird grounds out, shortstop Freddy Galvis to first baseman Kevin Frandsen.
Chris Dickerson walks.
Dewayne Wise singles on a fly ball to center fielder Tyson Gillies. Chris Dickerson to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Zoilo Almonte replaces Cole Garner.
Zoilo Almonte doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Tyson Gillies. Chris Dickerson scores. Dewayne Wise scores.
Justin Maxwell strikes out swinging.
Jimmy Rollins strikes out swinging.
Shane Victorino reaches on fielding error by shortstop Eduardo Nunez.
With Hunter Pence batting, throwing error by Ivan Nova on the pickoff attempt, Shane Victorino to 2nd.
Hunter Pence homers (1) on a fly ball to center field. Shane Victorino scores.
Jim Thome grounds out to first baseman Eric Chavez.
Ty Wigginton pops out to second baseman Bill Hall.
John Mayberry flies out to right fielder Nick Swisher.
Domonic Brown grounds out, second baseman Bill Hall to first baseman Eric Chavez.
Erik Kratz reaches on throwing error by third baseman Jayson Nix.
Michael Martinez strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: David Phelps replaces Ivan Nova.
Jimmy Rollins grounds out, pitcher David Phelps to first baseman Eric Chavez.
Shane Victorino flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Hunter Pence strikes out swinging.
Jim Thome lines out to second baseman Bill Hall.
Ty Wigginton singles on a line drive to right fielder Nick Swisher.
John Mayberry grounds into double play, shortstop Eduardo Nunez to second baseman Bill Hall to first baseman Eric Chavez. Ty Wigginton out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Chris Dickerson replaces left fielder Brett Gardner, batting 1st, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Dewayne Wise replaces center fielder Curtis Granderson, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Cole Garner replaces right fielder Nick Swisher, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Jorge Vazquez replaces first baseman Eric Chavez, batting 5th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Corban Joseph replaces second baseman Bill Hall, batting 8th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Brandon Laird replaces third baseman Jayson Nix, batting 9th, playing third base.
Pitcher Change: Manny Banuelos replaces David Phelps.
Domonic Brown grounds out, third baseman Brandon Laird to first baseman Jorge Vazquez.
Erik Kratz grounds out, third baseman Brandon Laird to first baseman Jorge Vazquez.
Michael Martinez grounds out, shortstop Eduardo Nunez to first baseman Jorge Vazquez.
Ramiro Pena remains in the game as the shortstop.
Freddy Galvis flies out to right fielder Cole Garner.
Scott Podsednik doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Chris Dickerson.
Tyson Gillies bunt grounds out, pitcher Manny Banuelos to first baseman Jorge Vazquez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Laynce Nix replaces Jim Thome.
Laynce Nix walks.
Hector Luna walks. Scott Podsednik to 3rd. Laynce Nix to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Cesar Hernandez replaces Laynce Nix.
John Mayberry pops out to shortstop Ramiro Pena.
Justin Maxwell remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Defensive Substitution: Gary Sanchez replaces catcher Russell Martin, batting 6th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Dellin Betances replaces Manny Banuelos.
Juan Pierre walks.
With Sebastian Valle batting, Juan Pierre steals (1) 2nd base.
Sebastian Valle walks.
Kevin Frandsen grounds into double play, shortstop Ramiro Pena to second baseman Corban Joseph to first baseman Jorge Vazquez. Juan Pierre to 3rd. Sebastian Valle out at 2nd.
Freddy Galvis flies out to center fielder Dewayne Wise.
Pitcher Change: Cesar Cabral replaces Dellin Betances.
Scott Podsednik flies out to left fielder Chris Dickerson.
Tyson Gillies singles on a ground ball to third baseman Brandon Laird, deflected by pitcher Cesar Cabral.
Cesar Hernandez lines out to right fielder Cole Garner.
Hector Luna singles on a line drive to center fielder Dewayne Wise. Tyson Gillies to 2nd.
Pete Orr flies out to center fielder Dewayne Wise.
Defensive switch from left field to right field for Chris Dickerson.
Zoilo Almonte remains in the game as the left fielder.
Pitcher Change: Michael O'Connor replaces Cesar Cabral.
Juan Pierre singles on a ground ball to center fielder Dewayne Wise.
Sebastian Valle flies out to center fielder Dewayne Wise.
Kevin Frandsen homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Juan Pierre scores.
Freddy Galvis lines out to shortstop Ramiro Pena.
Scott Podsednik walks.
Tyson Gillies doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Zoilo Almonte. Scott Podsednik scores.
